National IP Rights Center LLC

_________________
Technical assistants
[private]
[private]
* of counsel

November 7, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
Re: [#5269101]
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: DMCA Complaint

To Whom It May Concern:

We represent Testing Technologies, Inc., of Mamaroneck, New York. A company based in China is using our client's copyrighted content. See the identical content enclosed. Pursuant to the terms of the DMCA, please take down the site, www.Microedu.com, which is competing against our client by reselling his material.

Our prior request to remove the site received this response:

Subject: Re: [#5269101]

> [private],

> Thank you for your reply.  We understand your concern and would like to
>assist you. In order to comply with our copyright removal policy, please
>resend your DMGA complaint with the full list of the 300 offending pages
>as well as the Google Adwords ads infringing on your copyright.

Regards, The Google Team

Accordingly, we have included the materials requested.

DMCA Complaint:

1. Content is located at:

GRE Essay
Chapter 1

http://www.800score.com/awa%20folder/Essay%20Section/awac1.html
